alert.note: Alert for McKean; Warren (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 19 at 7:37AM EST by NWS State College
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT PARTS OF MCKEAN AND WARREN COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A snow squall which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 735 AM EST, a snow squall was along a line extending from 12 miles northeast of Jamestown to 25 miles northeast of Meadville and moving southeast at 30 MPH. THIS SQUALL WILL BE NEAR... Spring Creek around 750 AM EST. Grand Valley around 755 AM EST. Garland around 800 AM EST. Bradford around 825 AM EST. * This includes the following highways... Route 6 from near Corry to wetmore. Route 62 from south of Tidioute to the New York border. Route 219 from near the Bradford Regional Airport to the New York border. State Road 59 from Warren to the Bradford Regional Airport. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this squall. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
